Title: Can I Have a Mother
Writer: John Wells (developer), Paul Abbott (creator), William H. Macy, Steven Schachter, LaToya Morgan (staff writer)
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Justin Chatwin, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: The arrival of Grammy Gallagher (LOUISE FLETCHER) brings Frank and Fiona together, while the return of Steve is fraught with complications for Fiona.
